TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE . He was unrepresented before the ORG . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON of ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
